name: ORS Prisoners Not Allocated to Rehabilitation Provider
description: DQ0020 v2.0 Last Modified: 30/05/2022 - Prisoners Not Allocated to Rehabilitation Provider

dataset.name: Main Data
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS.DECISION_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS.PROVIDER_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS.ACTIVE_FLAG, AT_REHABILITATION_PROVIDERS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS.ACTIVE_FLAG AS REHAB_DECISION_PROVIDER_ACTI35 FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK AT_HEADER_BLOCK, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS, OMS_OWNER.REHABILITATION_PROVIDERS AT_REHABILITATION_PROVIDERS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS.OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISION_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS.OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISION_ID) AND (AT_REHABILITATION_PROVIDERS.PROVIDER_CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS.PROVIDER_CODE) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS IN ('CFLIFE', 'HMPL', 'MLP', 'SEC90', 'SEC90_03', 'SEC93', 'SEC93_03', 'ALP', 'DFL', 'DLP', 'SEC94', 'ALP_LASPO', 'DPP', 'IPP', 'LIFE', 'LR_ALP', 'LR_ALP_LASPO', 'LR_DLP', 'LR_DPP', 'LR_IPP', 'LR_LIFE', 'LR_MLP', 'EXSENT', 'EXSENT03', 'EXSENT08', 'LR_EPP', 'LR_SEC236A', 'SEC236A', 'SENT_EXL', 'ADIMP_ORA', 'CJCON08', 'CUSTPLUS', 'INT_CUST', 'LASPO_AR', 'LASPO_DR', 'LR_LASPO_AR', 'LR_LASPO_DR', 'SENT', 'SENT03', 'S47MHA', 'CRIM_CON', 'LR_SEC91_ORA', 'SEC91', 'SEC91_03', 'SEC91_03_ORA', (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), 'YOI_ORA', 'REFER', 'DTO', 'DTO_ORA', 'FTR/08', 'LR', 'LR_ES', 'LR_ORA', 'LR_YOI', 'LR_YOI_ORA', '14FTR_ORA', '14FTRHDC_ORA', 'CUR_ORA', 'FTR_HDC', 'FTR_HDC_ORA', 'FTR_ORA', 'FTR_SCH15', 'FTRSCH15_ORA', 'HDR_ORA', 'LR_HDC', 'BOAR', 'BOTUS', 'UNK_SENT', 'A_FINE', 'A_FINE1', 'A_FINE2', 'AFIXED', 'YOFINE', 'YOFIXED', 'ALP_CODE18', 'ALP_CODE21', 'FTRSCH18', 'FTRSCH18_ORA', 'EDS18', 'EDS21', 'EDSU18', 'LR_ALP_CDE18', 'LR_ALP_CDE21', 'LR_EDS18', 'LR_SOPC18', 'LR_SOPC21', 'SEC250_ORA', 'SEC250', 'SEC275', 'SEC272', 'SOPC21', 'SOPC18', 'LRSEC250_ORA', 'LR_EDS21', 'ADIMP_ORA20') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_HEADER_BLOCK.STATUS_DISPLAY IN ('Active') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('IN', 'OUT') AND NOT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK AT_HEADER_BLOCK, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS.OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISION_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS.OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISION_ID) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS IN ('CFLIFE', 'HMPL', 'MLP', 'SEC90', 'SEC90_03', 'SEC93', 'SEC93_03', 'ALP', 'DFL', 'DLP', 'SEC94', 'ALP_LASPO', 'DPP', 'IPP', 'LIFE', 'LR_ALP', 'LR_ALP_LASPO', 'LR_DLP', 'LR_DPP', 'LR_IPP', 'LR_LIFE', 'LR_MLP', 'EXSENT', 'EXSENT03', 'EXSENT08', 'LR_EPP', 'LR_SEC236A', 'SEC236A', 'SENT_EXL', 'ADIMP_ORA', 'CJCON08', 'CUSTPLUS', 'INT_CUST', 'LASPO_AR', 'LASPO_DR', 'LR_LASPO_AR', 'LR_LASPO_DR', 'SENT', 'SENT03', 'S47MHA', 'CRIM_CON', 'LR_SEC91_ORA', 'SEC91', 'SEC91_03', 'SEC91_03_ORA', (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), 'YOI_ORA', 'REFER', 'DTO', 'DTO_ORA', 'FTR/08', 'LR', 'LR_ES', 'LR_ORA', 'LR_YOI', 'LR_YOI_ORA', '14FTR_ORA', '14FTRHDC_ORA', 'CUR_ORA', 'FTR_HDC', 'FTR_HDC_ORA', 'FTR_ORA', 'FTR_SCH15', 'FTRSCH15_ORA', 'HDR_ORA', 'LR_HDC', 'BOAR', 'BOTUS', 'UNK_SENT', 'A_FINE', 'A_FINE1', 'A_FINE2', 'AFIXED', 'YOFINE', 'YOFIXED', 'ALP_CODE18', 'ALP_CODE21', 'FTRSCH18', 'FTRSCH18_ORA', 'EDS18', 'EDS21', 'EDSU18', 'LR_ALP_CDE18', 'LR_ALP_CDE21', 'LR_EDS18', 'LR_SOPC18', 'LR_SOPC21', 'SEC250_ORA', 'SEC250', 'SEC275', 'SEC272', 'LR_EDS21', 'LRSEC250_ORA', 'ADIMP_ORA20', 'SOPC21', 'SOPC18') AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_HEADER_BLOCK.STATUS_DISPLAY IN ('Active') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('IN', 'OUT') AND (AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_DECISIONS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_REHAB_PROVIDERS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, DECISION_CODE, PROVIDER_CODE, ACTIVE_FLAG, DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, REHAB_DECISION_PROVIDER_ACTI35, 'TBD' AS V_CASE_ADMIN FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Case Admin
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_PEOPLE.FIRST_NAME, AT_PEOPLE.LAST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.PERSONS AT_PEOPLE, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSONS AT_CONTACTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_CONTACTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_PEOPLE.PERSON_ID (+) = AT_CONTACTS.PERSON_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN ('A1048CN', 'A2170ET', 'A7778EQ', 'A9453DP') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_CONTACTS.ACTIVE_FLAG IN ('Y') AND AT_CONTACTS.RELATIONSHIP_TYPE IN ('CA'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE REHAB_DECISION_CODE <> 'NSO')

field.name: $ref:V_CASE_ADMIN
field.legacySql: =([CP Last Name]+", "+[CP First Name]) In ([NOMS Number])

errors.error:
dataset::resolveCTEs parse error for : $ref:V_CASE_ADMIN :: Error: =([CP Last Name]+", "+[CP First Name]) In ([NOMS Number]) ==> Error: Expected end of input but "I" found.
 at undefined:1:40

dataset::injectCalculations parse error for : $ref:V_CASE_ADMIN :: Error: =([CP Last Name]+", "+[CP First Name]) In ([NOMS Number]) ==> Error: Expected end of input but "I" found.
 at undefined:1:40
